channel.title: music on Paul Cutler
channel.description: Recent content in music on Paul Cutler

item.title: Listening to my Record Collection Alphabetically
item.description: I love this blog post from Discogs. I’ve often thought of doing exactly what it lays out: listen to your record collection from A to Z. I know there are a lot of records I rarely listen to. Whether I bought them because I love the artist, because of their rarity, or just because I was taking a chance on something new, I’m sure there are records collecting dust. I’ve done a pretty good job, especially last year in the first year of the pandemic, selling off any records I know I won’t listen to again on Discogs.

item.title: Vinyl Will Never Die
item.description: Via Reddit, music sales (by type) over the last 30 years. Spoiler alert: vinyl never dies!
